answers.answer: Far and away the most common thing that would cause that is "wet" (exudative) macular degeneration. It was once thought to be due exclusively to aging but has been demonstrated to be a inherited disease mediated by one or all of three different genes.JCH MD
By the way wet AMD is much more common and worse in smokers.JCH MD
